name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **Go**, **Ruby**, and **PostgreSQL**, with hands-on experience in developing backend solutions using **Kubernetes**, **AWS**, **Kafka**, and **ELK** stack. Expertise in Domain-Driven Design, ensuring robust coding practices through effective **Code Quality** measures and diligent **Testing** protocols.

Skilled in adopting and promoting **Code Reviews**, fostering **Teamwork**, and demonstrating strong **Communication** skills to enhance project outcomes. Well-versed in agile methodologies, embracing **Problem Solving** and **Curiosity** to tackle complex challenges, delivering impactful solutions aligned with business goals. Experienced in implementing best practices to drive impact orientation across teams.
